title: Related components:
p: CPUs connect to many components: memory to store data and instructions, a scheduler to provide step! signals, software trap emulators, debugger interfaces. The step-cycles output pin may be used as a N-event-control input for a target scheduler to track an estimate of consumed target time.
title: Host system:
p: Some error conditions are signalled by messages to standard error. These include some illegal CPU states caused by the simulated program.
